description: Capsicums, zucchini and red onions make a delicious filling for these feta topped Turkish pides.
keywords: Zucchini,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Pide,Peanut free
name: Veggie & Feta Pide Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Tip the flour, sugar, yeast and salt into a large bowl and stir to combine. Add 80ml of warm water and 2 tablespoons of oil and mix to combine. Tip on to a lightly floured work surface and knead for 5 minutes until smooth and springy.
Place in an oiled bowl and cover with a damp towel. Set aside to rise in a warm place for 1 hour.
Add the remaining oil to a large pan on medium heat and cook the onions for 5 minutes. Add the capsicums and zucchini and cook for 5-7 minutes until tender.
Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Tip the dough on to a floured work surface and cut into 4 pieces. Roll each piece into an oval shape.

Place the dough ovals on a lined baking tray and spoon the vegetable mix onto each, sprinkling a layer of crumbled feta on top. Leave a border around the edges and roll up to form a crust. Brush the edges with beaten egg and bake for 10-15 minutes until golden and crisp.
